Tendulkar received the Arjuna Award in 1994 for his outstanding sporting achievement, the Rajiv Gandhi Khel Ratna award in 1997, India's highest sporting honour, and the Padma Shri and Padma Vibhushan awards in 1999 and 2008, respectively, India's fourth and second highest civilian awards.,8812.366666666665,18507,8981,2,9524
The Awful Truth was selected in 1996 for preservation in the Library of Congress' National Film Registry for being culturally, historically, or aesthetically significant.,8813.366666666665,18508,8982,2,9524
In 2016, The Birds was deemed culturally, historically, or aesthetically significant by the United States Library of Congress, and selected for preservation in its National Film Registry.,8814.366666666665,18509,8983,2,9524
